item.title: My Experience with the Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: Introduction Hi there! I’ve been working on the IT helpdesk for over a year now. To keep growing professionally, I’ve decided to delve into learning about the different areas in IT. Iâ€™m currently working on a homelab but I needed a different project to sink my teeth into while I work on that. With so many fields to choose from I took a stab and chose cloud with the Cloud Resume Challenge.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Daniel and my IT escapade began in 2022 on the helpdesk. With a degree in Journalism to my name, my IT know-how was pretty basic. My Uni experience wasn’t really assisting with me with configure any routers. However, a neat little project where I set up a Plex server on an old laptop really kick-started my learning. It’s projects like these, which I think are fantastic ways to learn, are what I plan to post on this blog.
